item.title: James Comey pleads not guilty to charges sought by Trump, trial set for Jan. 5
item.description: "My family and I have known for years that there are costs to standing up to Donald Trump," former FBI Director James Comey said after being indicted.

item.title: U.S. air traffic control staffing hit for second day, delaying flights
item.description: Air traffic control staffing issues are delaying flights for a second straight day at numerous U.S. airports as the government shutdown reaches its se...

item.title: Republicans face pressure to consider Democrats' health-care demands as shutdown drags on
item.description: Democrats have refused to vote for any funding legislation unless it includes an extension of Obamacare subsidies, which are due to expire before Janu...

item.title: Trump suggests not all furloughed workers will get back pay: 'It depends'
item.description: Trump also said at the White House that if the shutdown drags on several days longer, a "substantial" number of jobs "will never come back."

item.title: AG Bondi stonewalls question about Trump mentions in Epstein files at Senate hearing
item.description: The Trump administration for months has faced criticism for refusing to release files about Jeffrey Epstein, a former friend of President Trump.
